content: बाधक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (धिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [बाध् ण्वुल्] {@--1@} Troubling, tormenting, oppressing. {@--2@} Vexing, annoying. {@--3@} Annulling. {@--4@} Suspending, contradicting, invalidating (as a rule &c.). {@--5@} Hindering. --कः A particular disease of women (ऋतुकाले प्रजाजननशक्तिप्रतिरोधकः).
